befungeinterpreter
Class BefungeProgram

java.lang.Object
  befungeinterpreter.BefungeProgram

public class BefungeProgram
extends java.lang.Object

This class represents a Befungeprogram and is able to execute it step by step. There are some minor differences to the original Language Specifications:

  • The stack can hold Java long values (64 bit) instead of C signed longs (usually 32 bit).
    • When saving or loading a file, however, the cells are converted to char.
  • The &-Command reads a supplemental character. However this should not cause any problems. Usually it will be the end-of-line sign it reads, or a whitespace between two numbers.
    • Nontheless every program that runs on Chris Pressey's original interpreter should also work in this one.

    getCellAt

    public long getCellAt(int col,
                      int row)
    Returns the character or the command in the given column and row. 0, 0 refers to the upper-left command.

    nextStep

    public int nextStep()
             throws befungeinterpreter.SyntaxErrorException,
                    befungeinterpreter.ProgramExecutionException,
                    java.io.IOException
    Does the next step in interpreting the Befunge program.

    Returns:
    BefungeProgram.CODE_CHANGED if the code has been changed due to a 'p' comand. BefungeProgram.NEW_OUTPUTS if outputs have been effectuated. BefungeProgram.WAITS_FOR_INPUT if Inputs are demanded before continuing. BefungeProgram.PROGRAM_ENDS if the Programs end has ben encountered. BefungeProgram.PROGRAM_OK if none of the previous things is true.
    Throws:
    befungeinterpreter.SyntaxErrorException
    befungeinterpreter.ProgramExecutionException
    java.io.IOException

    reset

    public void reset()
    Restarts the program, i.e. puts the Program Counter (PC) into the upper-left corner, pointing to the right and clears the stack. Should be called before starting a program. Then you use nextStep() to execute it.

    clear

    public void clear()
    Clears the program, i.e. sets every cell to ' '.

    loadFile

    public void loadFile(java.lang.String file)
              throws java.io.IOException
    Loads a Befungefile from a textfile. The Textfile should contain a linefeed only as Carriage return.

    Throws:
    java.io.IOException

    saveFile

    public void saveFile(java.lang.String file)
              throws java.io.IOException
    Saves a Befunge Program on the hard drive.

    Throws:
    java.io.IOException

    changedSinceLastSave

    public boolean changedSinceLastSave()
    Returns wether setCellAt() ha been called after the last call of saveFile().

    saveProgram

    public void saveProgram()
    Creates a copy of the current Program. The Program can be restored to the state it was when calling this method, by a a call to restoreProgram().

    restoreProgram

    public void restoreProgram()
    Restores the program to the state it was at the last call of saveProgram.

    getPC

    public PC getPC()
    Returns the Program Counter.

    getBefungeStack

    public BefungeStack getBefungeStack()
